title: I started a business with Rs. 100,000. What is a journal entry? - Quora

response.answer_text: As you are bringing cash into the business, cash - an asset, will have the property of debit what comes in. Therefore, we debit the cash account. Since you are bringing cash as capital for the business, capital - a representative personal account will have the property of credit the receiver. Hence, we will credit the capital account. So, the final entry will be as follows: Cash A/C….. Dr To Capital A/C
Cash/Bank a/c Dr. To Cspital a/c
